channel.title: Transmote Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Version 0.1.25
item.description:
• Added Sparkle app updater
  • Slightly improved torrent name matching
  • Cover art fills the cells rather than fitting inside them
  • Bug fixes

item.title: Version 0.1.18
item.description:
Initial release

  • Accepts magnet links from browsers and forwards them to your server - useful if you are running Transmission remotely eg on a NAS.
  • Attempts to fetch artwork and real names for movies and TV shows - though this is somewhat unreliable and based on the raw name of the torrent.
  • You can remove and delete torrents from your server.
